definition: Wu Jianhao or Vanness Wu (1978-), Taiwan pop star and actor, F4 band member
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
grand/heroic

sentences.english: Van Ness could only offer a smile.
sentences.chinese: 吳建豪只能提供一個微笑。

sentences.english: Vanness is the most energetic member of the F4.
sentences.chinese: 吳建豪是最有力的成員F4鍵。

sentences.english: Are there any videos or photos of Vanness that make you smile or laugh?
sentences.chinese: 是否有任何影片或照片的吳建豪，讓你微笑或大笑？

sentences.english: Van Ness, who is a staunch Christian, said he prayed to overcome the problem.
sentences.chinese: 吳建豪，誰是堅定的基督徒說，他祈禱克服這個問題。

sentences.english: Hi i'm also a big fan of Vanness, I love watching his tv shows.
sentences.chinese: 您好，我也是吳建豪迷，我喜歡看他的電視節目。

sentences.english: On the film set, in front of the media, Ady apologised to Van Ness.
sentences.chinese: 在這部電影的佈景，在媒體面前，奧迪吳建豪道歉。

sentences.english: Vanness smile is so big and bright.
sentences.chinese: 吳建豪微笑是那麼大，明亮。
